thread.title: Djokovic Coasts to Title
thread.title_full: Djokovic Coasts to Title - The New York Times

author: The Associated Press
title: Djokovic Coasts to Title
text:
Novak Djokovic won the Shanghai Masters, defeating Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, 6-2, 6-4, and capturing his ninth title of the season.
■ Jelena Jankovic rallied to beat Angelique Kerber, 3-6, 7-6 (4), 6-1, in the final of the Hong Kong Open.
■ Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova won her first title of the season, defeating Anna-Lena Friedsam, 6-4, 6-3, in the final of the Generali Ladies in Linz, Austria. (AP)
